column2: as we had tickets to a show at 7:30pm.  Called to say we'd be 3-5 minutes late
column3: said "no problem!"  We walked through the door at 5:02pm.  They told us they were waiting for a few tables to clear
column5: they sat a whole MESS of walk-ins before us
column6: and then I saw the hostess say
column11: they sacrificed a 4-top for the two of us.  We were in our cushy booth at 5:18pm.
